casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Salim Abdu GOULD 91P14-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 24, 2019 Salim Abdu Gould, for Gould, Salim Abdu. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. William D. Spence, Attorney at Law, Kinston, for Gould, Salim Abdu. Kenneth A. Sack, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C. Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State of N.C. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of July 2019 by Defendant for Writ of Habeas Corpus Arbitration-Mediation: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of July 2019." Davis, J. recused
